venue.name: Nutts Pond - Precourt Park - Off of South Willow

item.description:
Nutts Pond

Remember to Bring Poop Plastic Bags

I will try and schedule this at least once a week, weather permitting.

See Messages --> Cancellation Policy
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be parked closest to the first field on the right as you enter Precourt Park - look for my Golden Retriever Hugo & the puppy mobile: green Volvo Station Wagon with NH eprint plates. Look for Meetup Sign in the car.
item.why: Lots of grass in the fenced enclosed fields, rail trail flanks the backside of the Pond. Very close to home (maybe even walking distance for you), perfect after dinner walk, before settling in for the night.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Precourt Park - Nutts Pond - Off South Willow
